attributes.action: Give the public a vote on the current government by calling a general election.
attributes.additional_details: Covid was global epidemic. The suffering was widespread from direct effects of the disease itself or indirect effects from processes and rules designed to limit the spread of the disease and prevent hospitals being overwhelmed. The privileges report has now been published and those who directly or indirectly suffered deserve to have a chance to voice how they feel. It is likely that reading the report is extremely distressing for those who have lost loved ones as a consequence to the rules.
attributes.background: Give the opportunity to the public to voice an opinion on their MP relating to the Boris Johnson privileges report into whether he misled parliament and thus the public. For the public to assess their MP and how they vote.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631901
